name: Dreary Lights
description:
Dreary Lights is a survival-horror puzzle game set in a vaporwave world, in which, after a power outage, you've been trapped inside the Omega power facilities and, with the help of unique weapons, you must repair the energy transformers to fix the energy nucleus and get out, escaping the killer androids.

Created by Camilo Quintero 

This is a prototype of the first section of the game.

(All coding, art & design is original. Audio from freesound & Incompetech libraries and edited in Audacity)

Feel free to leave a comment about the game.
